title: Dynasty Shingles
info: Dynasty Shingles are Blocks purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 50 a piece, and are only sold when the Traveling Merchant is also selling Dynasty Wood. They cannot be crafted into any Walls. The red and blue types are identical, except for their color. They resemble Asian style roofing. When two or more are placed next to each other, they form sharp edges.
